item.description:
Come celebrate Halloween with us. There will be a $200 prize for the best costume. We will have holiday decorations, munchies and a rocking DJ playing all your favorite oldies, the best of today's dance songs and any request you may have.

If you don't dress in costume "Business" attire is a must. Men should wear sport jackets, collared shirts. Women...you know what to wear!

Admission Men/$20 Women/$15.
You can pay cash at the door.

Please sign up for all North of 40 Singles Dances via our websites
http://www.northof40s...
http://www.meetup.com...

See you soon!

Rick Pierro
North of 40 Singles
item.name: Saturday, October 31 Halloween Party
